net.proteusframework.cms

Enum FileSystemDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<FileSystemDirectory>
      • net.proteusframework.cms.FileSystemDirectory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<FileSystemDirectory>

    public enum FileSystemDirectory
extends java.lang.Enum<FileSystemDirectory>
    A set of predefined directories.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

      • getAllChildPaths

        public static <T extends FileSystemEntity> java.util.Collection<java.util.List<FileSystemEntity>> getAllChildPaths(DirectoryEntity dir,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                                                                                                   boolean includeRoot)
                                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Get all child paths of the specified directory.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type.
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory.
        type - the type of FileSystemEntities.
        includeRoot - include the specified root directory.
        Returns:
        the child paths.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs accessing the file system.

      • getUpdateContentRestrictionsTask

        public static Task getUpdateContentRestrictionsTask()
        Return a task to update the content type restrictions for the sites.

        This task should be ran after creating a new directory or updating the content-type restrictions for a directory.

        Returns:
        the automation task.
